about.content:
PROAIR SDN BHD, a contracting mechanical and electrical company was established in 1990 with the main objective of providing engineering services to the commercial and marine industries. The firm has since successfully completed, in the field of mechanical and electrical engineering works which include hotels, factories, office etc. Included are many local and foreign vessels ( ocean tankers, Offshore Supply Vessels) for the marine Oil and Gas industry as well as specialized jobs for the defense industry.

Proair has completed the HVAC package for navy ships and is a registered HVAC and Refrigeration contractor with the following and more:

services.content:
The firm is capable of providing engineering contracting services on a turnkey basis, to provide engineering services independently, in one single contract.

The full scope of services include all phases of mechanical and electrical engineering with details in each discipline as follows:
